title: Cerberus Tips
description: Tips on Cerberus Honor Hunting formation.

fields.name: Best Troops
fields.value:
• Pilgrims: 2 level-9 or 3 level-8
• Brawlers: 3 level-9 or 4 level-8
• Pumpkin Guard: 1 or 2
• Voodoo Dolls: a lot of level-9
• Necromancer: a lot of level-9
• Taurus Witcher: a lot of level-9
• Nun: a few

fields.name: Filler Troops
fields.value:
• Voodoo Dolls: level-8
• Peltasts: level-9
• Ghost Assassins: level-9
• Undead Soldier: level-9
• Other 9-load troops, preferably level-9

fields.name: Stages
fields.value:
• Stage 1: day 1-2
• Stage 2: day 3-4
• Stage 3: day 5-7
